nodes.text: Jovan III, often called simply Jovan, was a planet located in the Jovan system and was noted for the Jovan Station, built in orbit around the planet.
Jovan III was a fertile planet and one of the premier agriworld of the Gordian Reach. It was crisscrossed by robo-harvesters and dotted with agricultural research labs.
After the Battle of Yavin, the Galactic Empire converted the Jovan Station as the headquarters of the Blockade of Yavin. This seriously affected the commerce of the planet and the entire system.
